saga::isn Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

The Information System Navigation (ISN) API package.

The ISN API provides an interfaces to retrieve data from an information model. A possible starting point for navigation would be a service, as selected with the saga::sd API. Alternatively it is possible to start with a selected entity type rather than a service. An optional filter can be used to restrict the results returned.

The quality of the information returned will depend upon the quality of the data in the back-end system or systems.
